column9: paused :: BOOLEAN?)¦add a trigger kernelTransaction under a name
column10: in the kernelTransaction you can use {createdNodes}
column12: the selector is {phase:'before/after/rollback'} returns previous and new trigger information. Takes in an optional configuration.

column6: paused :: BOOLEAN?)¦CALL apoc.trigger.pause(name) | it pauses the trigger
paused :: BOOLEAN?)¦removes all previously added trigger
paused :: BOOLEAN?)¦CALL apoc.trigger.resume(name) | it resumes the paused trigger
